Text: Mordred lets out a beastly roar.

His mighty arm swings down on Shadow, but it is
effortlessly caught.

Even a beast should catch on when there's a
difference in strength...
I'll have to rank you below Delta.

The gods, in their attempt to chastise the mortals
below, hurled thunder from the heavens.

People were captivated by this power raining down
from the sky and longed to possess it. "I need that
power. I must grasp it," they said.

And so, through relentless pursuit and study,
humanity finally harnessed it. The nuclear energy,
nestled between the protons and neutrons in the
atomic nucleus, unleashed through nuclear fission...

...It's all about complex things like indices,
functions, and a whole lot of chain reactions that
somehow lead to a monumental blast of energy.
But, let's not get bogged down with the details.

Beyond the heavens, from this world of silence,
rains down the ultimate destruction... That's
what I must surpass.

Seeing this place, feeling it, I once again see
what I must do.
You've helped me return to my roots.
I'll give it my best shot, so kindly accept it.

sometimes a brute force approach isn't so bad,
right?
